A4.text: John Curtin (8 January 1885 â€“ 5 July 1945) was an Australian politician who served as the 14th prime minister of Australia from 1941 until his death in 1945.

A5.text: He became the first and only prime minister to come from Western Australia.

A6.text: John Curtin declared that Australia is at war with Japan in 1941.
